text: Ovalentaria is a clade of ray-finned fishes within the Percomorpha. It includes the order Stiassnyiformes. Some authors have used it for a clade including Mugiloidei, Plesiopidae, Blenniiformes, Atherinomorpha, and Cichlidae. It was named by W. L. Smith and T. J. Near in Wainwright in 2012. == Classification == === Atheriniformes === * Order Atheriniformes * Suborder Atherinopsoidei ** Family Atherinopsidae (Neotropical silversides) * Suborder Atherinoidei ** Family Atherinidae (Old World silversides) ** Family Dentatherinidae (Mercer's tusked silverside) == Taxonomy == Scientific classification Kingdom: Animalia Phylum: Chordata Class: Actinopterygii Clade: Percomorpha (unranked): Ovalentaria == References == # J. S. Nelson; T. C. Grande; M. V. H. Wilson (2016). Fishes of the World (5th ed.). Wiley. p. 752. ISBN 978-1-118-34233-6. * Category:Teleosts
title: Ovalentaria
